data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Billing document for Export'
define view entity ZETR_DDL_I_BIL_DOC
  as select from    zetr_t_r102            as ExportDocumentHeader
    left outer join I_BillingDocumentItem  as _BillingDocumentItem  on _BillingDocumentItem.BillingDocument = ExportDocumentHeader.vbeln
    left outer join I_OutboundDeliveryItem as _OUTBOUNDDELIVERYITEM on _OUTBOUNDDELIVERYITEM.ReferenceSDDocument = _BillingDocumentItem.SalesDocument

  association to parent ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD as _ExportFile on $projection.FileExportNo = _ExportFile.Filen
{

  key ExportDocumentHeader.filen             as FileExportNo,
  key ExportDocumentHeader.vbeln             as FilenDocument,

      _BillingDocumentItem.SalesDocument     as SalesDocument,
      _OUTBOUNDDELIVERYITEM.OutboundDelivery as OutboundDelivery,
      _BillingDocumentItem.SoldProduct       as SoldProduct,
      _ExportFile


}
